item.title: Ursula
item.description: This is a contributed story, written by Christina. It seems to me to paint an interesting image of our time, but also of every other time. I will say no more, but let you read it. Enjoy In a time of no importance, a village stood on a hill. From the church tower, looking out over the valleys around, you might, on a good day, have had a spectacular view of rolling undulations, some forested, others crisscrossed by hedges, sloping down to the sea, or rising into further hills on the distant horizon.
